headline.main: HITLER'S 'FRIGHTFUL WEAPON': PROPAGANDA; The Nazis nave made a specialty of psychological attack, but Americans, too, could play at that game.

lead_paragraph: WHEN President Roosevelt, in his historic address to the world last Tuesday night, predicted the eventual disruption of the Nazi system of domination in Europe through uprisings of the conquered peoples -- including the German and Italian peoples -- he did more than express a pious hope.
snippet: WHEN President Roosevelt, in his historic address to the world last Tuesday night, predicted the eventual disruption of the Nazi system of domination in Europe through uprisings of the conquered peoples -- including the German and Italian peoples ...

byline.original: By EDMOND TAYLOR Author of "The Strategy of Terror"
